verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H663>Aphek:<s%> and the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on by <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and by <S%H505>thousands:<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on in the rear <S%H314>guard<s%> with <S%H397>Achish.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> do <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> here? And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> Is not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H1961>been<s%> with me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3972>fault<s%> in him since he <S%H5307>fell<s%> to me to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day?<s%>

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with him; and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Make this <S%H376>fellow<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> that he may <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6485>appointed<s%> him, and let him not <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> with us to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> he be an <S%H7854>adversary<s%> to us: for with <S%H4100>which<s%> should he <S%H7521>reconcile<s%> himself to his <S%H113>master?<s%> should it not be with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H582>men?<s%>

Is not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> they <S%H6030>sang<s%> one to another in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands?<s%>

Then <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Surely, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> you have been <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and your <S%H3318>going<s%> out and your <S%H935>coming<s%> in with me in the <S%H4264>host<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight:<s%> for I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in you since the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H935>coming<s%> to me to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> nevertheless the <S%H5633>lords<s%> <S%H2896>favor<s%> you not.
Why <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> that you <S%H6213>displease<s%> not the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H397>Achish,<s%> But <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> have you <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H5650>servant<s%> so <S%H3117>long<s%> as I have <S%H1961>been<s%> with you to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I may not <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H341>enemies<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%>

And <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H2896>good<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> as an angel of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H389>notwithstanding<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> He shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> up with us to the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Why <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7925>rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> with your <S%H113>master's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> that are <S%H935>come<s%> with you: and as soon as you be up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and have <S%H216>light,<s%> <S%H3212>depart.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> to <S%H3212>depart<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>
